metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20178 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Read in the function process_demand_active() that results in a Denial of Service (segfault).

criterions.comment: rdesktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
